meta.title: Maciej Toborek, Full Stack dev
meta.keywords: web developer, full stack develper, front end developer, portfolio
meta.description: Hi, it's me - full of creativity, cheerful developer. If you're willing to hire me, write boldly ;)

heading.title: Maciej Toborek
heading.desc: Hi, I'm Junior Full Stack web developer.

paragraphs.heading: As a freelancer I:
list: built websites based on Wordpress CMS
created unusual animations in CSS, jQuery
optimized my own workflow on a regular basis

paragraphs.heading: In niepsuj.it I:
list: built websites based on the Silex PHP microframework
built websites based on Wordpress CMS
coded custom animations with CSS3 & JS (jQuery)

paragraphs.heading: In Mobile Technologies GmbH I:
list: worked with team on the speech2speech translator

paragraphs.heading: In Mojito Agencja Kreatywna sp. z o.o. I:

list.title: BSc. of Computer Science
list.desc:
At University of Silesia in Katowice.
One outstanding exam to pass

list.body: The UX designers were very impressed at how far you have come with the page, how good it looks and how well things are functioning. Your developers have done a fantastic job!
Mr. Toborek completed assigned to him work to our full satisfaction. He was always friendly and helpful to his superiors and colleagues.

My admiration to the site has no limits!! The site is great. Really, really good job. We are delighted. I knew from the beginning that cooperation with you would be great, but the results positively surpassed me. Congratulations once again. I will be recommending you with confidence. Thanks again.
